meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>cool</kanji> <kanji>storehouse</kanji> <kanji>storage</kanji> is a place you put things (like food) to keep them cool. This is a <vocabulary>refrigerator</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
